pull.title: [Docs] Added NSIS install steps to build-windows.md
pull.body:
This pull request is intended to close #14699 

I never built for Windows, so I'm not sure if the instructions I added are correct, please give me feedback on it. 

Thank you!

events.message: added nsis install steps to windows docs

issue.title: docs: Windows build docs are missing `make deploy`
issue.body:
When building for Windows (using `doc/build-windows.md`), I discovered the following steps were necessary but undocumented, in order to generate the installer:
```
sudo apt install nsis
make deploy
makensis share/setup.nsi
```

events.body: I'd suggest moving this down between the Depends and Installation sections of the build doc. Someone is not going to be able to run `make deploy` unless that have already completed the steps for a 32/64 bit build.

> I'd suggest moving this down between the Depends and Installation sections of the build doc. Someone is not going to be able to run `make deploy` unless that have already completed the steps for a 32/64 bit build.

Done!

events.message: moved the NSIS section to between Depends and Installation

events.body:
The last step (calling `makensis` manually) should not be necessary. `configure.ac` has logic to find `makensis`, you'll need to install it *before* calling `./configure` for that:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/configure.ac#L470

Then, `make deploy` will generate the installer for you:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/Makefile.am#L73

(see, for example, how the gitian build script works: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-win.yml#L157)

> The last step (calling `makensis` manually) should not be necessary. `configure.ac` has logic to find `makensis`, you'll need to install it _before_ calling `./configure` for that:
> 
> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/configure.ac#L470
> 
> Then, `make deploy` will generate the installer for you:
> 
> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/Makefile.am#L73
> 
> (see, for example, how the gitian build script works: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/gitian-descriptors/gitian-win.yml#L157)

Thank you very much for the explanation!

events.message: Changed NSIS section's title and excluded last step

issue.title: docs: add NSIS setup/install steps to windows docs
issue.body:
Supersedes #14744
Fixes: #14699

Rearranged the changes in #14744 to be more similar to the macOS docs.

events.body: @LucianaMarques Thanks for your work here. I've picked this up in #14950. The changes are still attributed to you.

 See also: [dependencies.md](dependencies.md).
 
+## Install NSIS
+
+The following steps are necessary to create the binary file. In order to create it, the system must
+have [NSIS](https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Main_Page) installed.
+
+```
+sudo apt install nsis
+make deploy
+makensis share/setup.nsi

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -129,6 +129,17 @@ Then build using:

+Create installer
+-----------------
+

comments.body: I think you should mention that it should be installed *before* running `./configure`, if you install it just before the `make` step in the steps below it's not going to work.
